other-features.name: Martial Versatility
other-features.details:
Whenever you reach a level in this class that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can do one of the following, as you shift the focus of your martial practice.
- Replace a fighting style you know with another fighting style available to fighters.
- If you know any maneuvers from the Battle Master archetype, you can replace one maneuver you know with a different maneuver.

other-features.name: Extra Attack
other-features.details: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. This increases to 3 at level 11 and four at level 20.

other-features.name: Indomitable
other-features.details: You can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll, and you can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest. You can use this feature twice between long rests starting at 13th level and three times between long rests starting at 17th level.
